}} 'Threshold' is a 1981 drama/science fiction film from Canada, directed by
Richard Pearce. It starred Donald Sutherland and Jeff Goldblum. The film was
nominated for eight Genie Awards in 1983 and won three of them. Sutherland also
won best actor at the 1982 Karlovy Vary International Film Festival for his
performance. http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0083197/awards
